entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High zero except 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero except 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except zero near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6 except zero near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 6 April 2023
